ing: 5 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and chopped
5 Red Delicious apples - peeled, cored and chopped
1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "This a great dessert salad to serve after dinner. My children don't eat much fruit but they eat this salad.  "
ins: In a medium-size mixing bowl, combine the apples, drained pineapple, raisins, pecans and whipped topping. Mix well and serve chilled.
